quality_assessment: Excellent - Documentation is comprehensive, accurate, and well-aligned with implementation
positive_aspects: Complete coverage of all four mapped features (global_env, secrets, profiles, env_files)
Accurate documentation of variable types (static, dynamic, conditional)
Correct secrets syntax with both inline and block formats
Profile configuration accurately documented with activation via --profile flag
Environment file support properly explained with precedence rules
Excellent examples with references to actual workflow files
Per-step environment configuration (temporary, clear_env) accurately covered
Usage examples across all workflow phases (setup, map, reduce, merge)
Clear troubleshooting section addressing common issues
Best practices section provides actionable guidance
All internal cross-references are valid and correct
Code examples match actual implementation in workflows/environment-example.yml and workflows/mapreduce-env-example.yml
